"What do you want to know?":
"A \"Collection File\"
is a system that makes you gather specific items to obtain rare weapons or eggs from a list of rewards.

Talk to \"Pudding\" at the Quest Counter and select a reward from \"Collection File\".

In addition to the first 3 Sheets, you can get 2 more Sheets from Premium Set and 2 others from SG."

"The gauge of the required items will increase after killing the target enemy and clearing the quest.

At 100%, the next kill will guarantee the item drop and display \"COMPLETE!\". Clear all the requirements to get your reward item!

※If you happen to find one of the required items, it will instantly be marked as \"COMPLETE!\"."

"After receiving the reward, the same sheet can be reselected after the cooldown period.

You can use your Star Gems to reset the cooldown period and immediately reselect the sheet.

※Once completed, you can discard the sheet to select another one."
